justification: Vendor 3 states 'customizable reporting capabilities' and 'generation of operational, compliance, and performance reports directly from Digital Twin data,' directly addressing the configurable and customizable requirement. Details such as time-based queries, KPIs, scheduling, sharing, and embedding support stakeholder use. Compliance (ISO/IEC 27001, SOC 2, NIST SP 800-53) and multiple export formats are cited. However, no explicit mention of the limitation or flexibility of custom fields/formulas prevents a perfect score.
ability: The ability to generate configurable and customizable reports to get insights into the data
